FAQ / Wave 2 / Battle Cards /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Backup Beam

  1. What battle cards are in the Bumblebee vs Megatron Starter Set?
    2 x Primary Laser
    2 x Armored Plating
    2 x Handheld Blaster
    2 x Improvised Shield
    2 x Enforcement Batons
    2 x Security Console
    2 x Backup Beam
    2 x Grenade Launcher
    2 x Sparring Gear
    2 x Stealthiness
    2 x Vaporize
    2 x New Designs
    2 x Surprise Attack
    2 x Rest and Relaxation
    2 x Supercharge
    2 x Reckless Charge
    2 x Pep Talk
    2 x Equipment Enthusiast
    2 x Inferno Breath
    1 x Leap of Faith
    1 x Strafing Run
  2. What battle cards are in the Blaster Deck?
    2 x Basic Combat Protocol
    3 x Escape Route
    2 x Flamethrower
    3 x Force Field
    3 x Handheld Blaster
    3 x Vaporize
    2 x Zap
    3 x Daring Counterattack
    3 x Interpert the Airwaves
    3 x Obstructive Rhythm
    3 x Recover Cassette
    3 x Backup Beam
    2 x Grenade Launcher
    3 x Pep Talk
    2 x Incoming Transmission
  3. I am playing with Metroplex, and I have Backup Beam and Debilitating Crystal attached to him. My opponent has Menasor equipped with Stunticon Swagger. It is my turn, and I play Height Advantage to get the extra bold 4 to try and activate Metroplex's triggered ability from card flipping. As I declare him as the attacker, and Menasor as the defender, Debilitating Crystal activates. I choose to bounce Swagger to my opponent's hand. Does my bold then become active because the effect of Swagger is no longer active? Am I allowed to use the bold from the upgrade and the action now?
    Yes. Both bold effects would apply in this scenario. Stunticon Swagger does not stop a character from getting bold prior to the attack.
